      • register

        public void register(VariableReplacer replacer,
                     Plugin plugin,
                     String... variables)
        Register a new replacer
        Parameters:
        replacer - the variable replacer
        plugin - the associated plugin
        variables - all variables which this replacer can replace without the variable identifiers (%)

      • register

        public void register(VariableReplacer replacer,
                     Plugin plugin,
                     String description,
                     boolean global,
                     boolean async,
                     boolean constant,
                     String... variables)
        Register a new replacer
        Parameters:
        replacer - the variable replacer
        global - is the value the same for all players or does the replacer needs a specific player
        async - is this plugin thread safe
        constant - if the variable is updated based on events
        description - description of all variables of this plugin
        plugin - associated plugin instance
        variables - to replaced variables without the variable identifiers (%)

      • register

        public void register(VariableReplaceAdapter<? extends Plugin> replacer)
        Register a new replacer
        Parameters:
        replacer - the variable replacer

      • updateScore

        public void updateScore(Player player,
                        String variable,
                        int newScore)
        Notifies that a scoreboard value has changed. This should be called from an event listener.
        Parameters:
        player - who receives the update
        variable - what variable is going to be updated without the variable identifier
        newScore - what should be the new score

      • updateScore

        public void updateScore(String variable,
                        int newScore)
        Notifies that a scoreboard value has changed. This should be called from an event listener. This method will update the variable for all players
        Parameters:
        variable - what variable is going to be updated
        newScore - what should be the new score

      • getScore

        public ReplaceEvent getScore(Player player,
                             String variable,
                             String displayName,
                             int oldScore,
                             boolean complete)
                      throws UnknownVariableException
        Get the score for a specific variable.
        Parameters:
        player - the associated player
        variable - the variable
        displayName - the display name of the scoreboard item
        oldScore - the score of the scoreboard item
        complete - whether it's the first refresh
        Returns:
        the modified state
        Throws:
        UnknownVariableException - if the variable couldn't be replace

        Executes an update on all global replacers
